attributes.action: Help us to get a regular bus service.
attributes.background: We need a regular bus service to run from Colney Heath to St Albans.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local bus services are the responsibility of local bus operators and your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
